page.title: 09SELLING LAWN MOWERS
page.content: Mr.Sargeant has been running this lawn mower business since{August 1970 He sells and repairs lawn mowers. Mr.Sargeant has {30}to{40}lawnmowers in stock at any time in his business. He has 6 ride on mowers and 8 electric mowers. Mr Sargeant works from 8.00am to 10.00 pm on a Monday and he works on his own. He usually goes to two lawnmower {shows}a year. Mr Sargeant said that he likes to cut his lawns with a Morrison lawnmower.{ He gets very busy in Febuary to August when everybody wants their mowers repairing ready for the summer. He also has an old forge which he uses to make spare parts that cannot be bought any more. He likes old things and has a collection of bygones such as a sausage-making machine. He is Chairman of Governors of the school.
